com.electronauts.virtualrobot

Class AbstractSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.electronauts.virtualrobot.AbstractSensor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Gyroscope

    public abstract class AbstractSensor
extends java.lang.Object
    The AbstractSensor encapsulates methods common to all types of sensor. It allows the AbstractRobot class to query the various sensors onboard and make informed decisions based on the state of the simulation and surroundings.
